revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Edge300 large.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Cisco Edge 300 Series Switch |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/switches/edge-300-switch/model.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Cisco_Edge_300_(CS-E300-K9) |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Cisco |model = CS-E300 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -K9 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = media bridge, smart switch |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Atom;CE4150; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MT29F16G08ABABA; |flash1size = 2 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = SK hynix;H27UAG8T2B2R; |flash2size = 2 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M8DA-125:K; |ram1_num = 8 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1111; |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6046; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 1C:AA:07
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.28;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, |exp_usb_num = 4 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI, Audio In/Out (3.5mm), |addchip = 7-Port USB 2.0 Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2517-JZX;;1;,,, USB 2.0 Flash Controller;Phison Electronics;PS2251;;1;,,, 24-Bit,192-kHz Stereo DAC;Burr-Brown Products;PCM1755;;1;,,, 16-Bit I2C and SMBus Expander;TI;TCA9539;;1;,,, 64K 16-Bit MCU;Microchip;PIC24FJ64GA;;1;,,, Single Channel USB Power Switch;TI;TPS2065;;3;,,, Single-Chip HDMI Transmitter Port Protection;TI;TPD12S521;;1;,,, 1.5A Ultra LDO Linear Regulator;TI;TPS74201;;1;,,, 800mA Low Dropout Positive Regulator;Burr-Brown Products;;2;,,, 35V P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDD6637;;1;,,, Dual 30V N-Channel SyncFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS6982S;;1;,,, Dual Synchronous Step-Down Controller;TI;TPS51124;;1;,,, System Clock w/Selectable DDR Frequency;IDT;6V49185PAG;;1;,,, PC Main Clock;IDT;9LPRS525AGLF;;1;,,, Low-Power, Low-Offset Voltage,Dual Comparator;TI;LM393;;2;,,, 256K Two-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C256;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = cisco |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = U58O201T04 |manuf_rev = REV 03GP |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 09/2011 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: Intel Atom CE4150 @ 1.2GHz *GPU: Intel GMA500 *Memory: 2GB DDR3-1600 *Storage: 2GB SLC NAND Flash, 2GB MLC Flash *Network 1x Gigabit Ethernet, 4x Fast Ethernet *USB: 4x USB 2.0 *Power Source: 12V/5A via DC power
==Links of Interest== [https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/collateral/switches/edge-300-series/data_sheet_c78-694183.html Datasheet]
==See also== *[[Cisco Edge 340 DMP (CS-E340W)]] (-M32-A-K9) - ''Digital Media Player'' • [https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/collateral/video/edge-340-digital-media-player/datasheet-c78-732178.html DS] :● CPU: @1.60GHz (Dual-core) :● Memory: 2GB (DDR3 memory) :● Storage: 32GB (built-in SSD), one SD slot :(multi-level cell [MLC] SD card highly preferred)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
